Address.label: Address
Address.value: TOWER A, AVIC ZIJIN PLAZA,SIMING DISTRICT, XIAMEN, 361000, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Qudian Inc is a provider of online credit products using data-enabled technologies, such as artificial intelligence and machine learning in China. The company has two reportable segments namely Installment credit services and E-commerce sales services. It generates maximum revenue from the Installment credit services segment. The company derives the majority of its revenue from the China region. It offers cash credit products, which provide funds in digital form, and merchandise credit products.
